get.description: Returns a list of all users - requires admin role

post.description: Links an ORCID ID to the authenticated user's account
Unlinks the ORCID ID from the authenticated user's account

get.description: Returns the URL to redirect the user to for ORCID authentication
Returns the health status of the API

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token

get.summary: Get notifications for the logged-in user
get.description: Retrieves a list of notifications for the authenticated user

put.description: Marks a specific notification as read

get.description: Get a single product by ID
Returns the authenticated user's profile information
Retrieves a list of all projects

post.description: Creates and starts a new project with the provided details

get.description: Retrieves a single project by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing project with the provided details

400.description: invalid body, id or date format

get.summary: Get change log for a project
get.description: Retrieves the change log for a specific project

post.summary: Add a person to a project
post.description: Adds a new person to the specified project

delete.summary: Remove a person from a project
delete.description: Removes a person from the specified project

400.description: invalid project id or person id

post.summary: Add a product to a project
post.description: Adds an existing product to the specified project using its ID

400.description: invalid project id or product id

delete.summary: Remove a product from a project
delete.description: Removes a product association from the specified project

400.description: invalid project id or product id

post.description: Creates a new user account with the provided credentials

400.description: Invalid request body or missing fields

get.description: Returns the current status of the API
Retrieves a single user by its ID, provided as the `id` query parameter.

put.description: Updates an existing user's person reference and/or password based on the given ID and request body.

post.description: Creates a new user account for an existing person using the provided person ID and password.

400.description: invalid request body or missing person ID

delete.description: Deletes a user by its ID, provided as the `id` query parameter.
